attributes.action: To take a serious look at the sentencing laws as we do not seem to be giving the correct punishments for the crime.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I feel that the British punishment system is really bad as we can give someone who has sexually assaulted a child as little as 3 years this is not good enough and most of the sentencing is not substantial enough.  I do beleive we should bring back the death sentence as people nowadays are committing more sevear crimes on others than years ago.
